messages.subject: Need your help
messages.body:
Dear Friend, As you read this, I don't want you to feel sorry for me,
because, I believe everyone will die someday. My name is Muhammed Al-hakim
a  merchant in Dubai, in the U.A.E.I have been diagnosed with Esophageal
cancer. It has defiled all forms of medical treatment, and right now I
have only about a few months to live, according to medical experts. I have
not particularly lived my life so well, as I never really cared for
anyone(not even myself) but my business. Though I am very rich, I was
never generous, I was always hostile to people and only focused on my
business as that was the only thing I cared for. But now I regret all this
as I now know that there is more to life than just wanting to have or make
all the money in the world. I believe when God gives me a second chance to
come to this world I would live my life a different way from how I have
lived it. Now that God has called me, I have willed and given most of my
property and assets to my immediate and extended family members as well as
a few close friends. I want God to be merciful to me and accept my soul
so, I have decided to give also to charity organizations, as I want this
to be one of the last good deeds I do on earth. So far, I have distributed
money to some charity organizations in the U.A.E, Algeria and Malaysia.
Now that my health has deteriorated so badly, I cannot do this myself
anymore. I once asked members of my family to close one of my accounts and
distribute the money which I have there to charity organization in
Bulgaria and Isreal, they refused and kept the money to themselves. Hence,
I do not trust them anymore, as they seem not to be contended with what I
have left for them.
The last of my money which no one knows of is the huge cash deposit of
fifteen million dollars $15,000,000,00 that I have with a Security Company
abroad. I will want you to help me collect this deposit stashed in a
diplomtic box and dispatche it to the less priviledged and hungry.I am
failing in health and i have been restricted to a solitary life by the
doctors till i die.
I have set aside 30% for your time and service and expenses.
N.B:dear friend, please do reply to my alternate email address only:
mulalha@albaha.cc , for a faster response
Muhammed Al-hakim God be with you
messages.raw:
Muhammed Al-hakim

Subject: Need your help

Dear Friend,
As you read this, I don't want you to feel sorry for me, because, I believe everyone will die someday. My name is Muhammed Al-hakim a merchant in Dubai, in the U.A.E.I have been diagnosed with Esophageal cancer. It has defiled all forms of medical treatment, and right now I have only about a few months to live, according to medical experts. I have not particularly lived my life so well, as I never really cared for anyone(not even myself) but my business. Though I am very rich, I was never generous, I was always hostile to people and only focused on my business as that was the only thing I cared for. But now I regret all this as I now know that there is more to life than just wanting to have or make all the money in the world. I believe when God gives me a second chance to come to this world I would live my life a different way from how I have lived it. Now that God has called me, I have willed and given most of my property and assets to my immediate and extended family members as well as a few close friends. I want God to be merciful to me and accept my soul so, I have decided to give also to charity organizations, as I want this to be one of the last good deeds I do on earth. So far, I have distributed money to some charity organizations in the U.A.E, Algeria and Malaysia.
Now that my health has deteriorated so badly, I cannot do this myself anymore. I once asked members of my family to close one of my accounts and distribute the money which I have there to charity organization in Bulgaria and Isreal, they refused and kept the money to themselves. Hence, I do not trust them anymore, as they seem not to be contended with what I have left for them.
The last of my money which no one knows of is the huge cash deposit of fifteen million dollars $15,000,000,00 that I have with a Security Company abroad. I will want you to help me collect this deposit stashed in a diplomtic box and dispatche it to the less priviledged and hungry.I am failing in health and i have been restricted to a solitary life by the doctors till i die.
I have set aside 30% for your time and service and expenses.
N.B:dear friend, please do reply to my alternate email address only:
mulalha@albaha.cc , for a faster response
Muhammed Al-hakim God be with you

[... which is of course the basic Cancer letter. But you knew that. ]

messages.body:
Hello Muhammed Al-hakim,
what can I do for you?
Kind regards,
Fritz Fischer
messages.raw:
Fritz Fischer

Hello Muhammed Al-hakim,
what can I do for you?
Kind regards,
Fritz Fischer

messages.subject: I REALLY DO APPRECIATE
messages.body:
Dear friend

I really  do appreciate your initiative to help me fufil my last
wish/dream on  my dying bed.I am relying totally on you and would be glad
you do not disappoint me.


I do have a diplomatic box as you already know stocked with 15million$
held in a security company whose name and contact information i will send
to you later on receival of your assurance.The security company does not
know the contents and it is none of their business to know the contents as
their business is to safe keep the diplomatic box.what i want you to do is
to contact the security company and tell them you are the new benefeciary
of the diplomatic box i kept in their care, and that you want it to be
delivered to you.


I will provide all documents needed by the security company to effect a
change of benefeciary, so that they can safely deliver the box to you.I
hope i have been more explanatory to you, but i need your assurance on the
following:
-You will use the 70% for the less priviledged and you are not entitled to
more than 30% of the total funds as a reward from God for your efforts.
-This transaction will be kept secret between me and you without the
introduction of any third party.
-The contents of the diplomatic box will not be revealed to the security
company.

Can you give me your assurance on the above? Please do pray for me
everyday.Also i would like you to tell me more about yourself, like your

occupation,hobby,country where you reside e.t.c I am looking forward to
your reply

God be with you
MUhammed Al-Hakim
messages.raw:
Muhammed Al-hakim

Subject: I REALLY DO APPRECIATE

Dear friend

I really do appreciate your initiative to help me fufil my last wish/dream on my dying bed.I am relying totally on you and would be glad you do not disappoint me.

I do have a diplomatic box as you already know stocked with 15million$ held in a security company whose name and contact information i will send to you later on receival of your assurance.The security company does not know the contents and it is none of their business to know the contents as their business is to safe keep the diplomatic box.what i want you to do is to contact the security company and tell them you are the new benefeciary of the diplomatic box i kept in their care, and that you want it to be delivered to you.

I will provide all documents needed by the security company to effect a change of benefeciary, so that they can safely deliver the box to you.I hope i have been more explanatory to you, but i need your assurance on the following:
-You will use the 70% for the less priviledged and you are not entitled to more than 30% of the total funds as a reward from God for your efforts.
-This transaction will be kept secret between me and you without the introduction of any third party.
-The contents of the diplomatic box will not be revealed to the security company.

Can you give me your assurance on the above? Please do pray for me everyday.Also i would like you to tell me more about yourself, like your

occupation,hobby,country where you reside e.t.c I am looking forward to your reply

God be with you
MUhammed Al-Hakim

messages.body:
Dear Muhammed,

thank you very much for your fast answer. If a friend of mine would ask me
for such help under circumstances as you have described to me I of course
would do everything to help him without wanting such a high reward.

However as you do not know me at all I wonder why did you contact me,
where
did you get my e-mail address from and how could you trust me to receive
and
handle so much money? You certainly would have friends that could fulfill
your wishes instead of a person like me that you do not know. There are so
many charity organisations that you could contact to offer them your
money -
even if it is in a diplomatic case right now - but at least you would know
to whom you address your intentions and generosity. And if you have picked
out my e-mail address out of any list you certainly will have contacted
many
other persons as well, isn't it?

I would be very glad if you could give me some explanations on the above.

Of course it would be a great challenge for me to distribute so much money
to people or projects in order to improve their lives and to get rid of
famine, illness or illiteracy. I can give you my insurance on the details
you have mentioned.

I am living in Germany and currently I am working as a printer. Some of my
hobbies are: nature, my garden, my canoe, sailing. Apart from that I am
very
much interested in history, other countries, cultures and religions.

All my best wishes to you
Fritz
messages.raw:
Fritz Fischer

thank you very much for your fast answer. If a friend of mine would ask me for such help under circumstances as you have described to me I of course would do everything to help him without wanting such a high reward.

However as you do not know me at all I wonder why did you contact me, where did you get my e-mail address from and how could you trust me to receive and handle so much money? You certainly would have friends that could fulfill your wishes instead of a person like me that you do not know. There are so many charity organisations that you could contact to offer them your money - even if it is in a diplomatic case right now - but at least you would know to whom you address your intentions and generosity. And if you have picked out my e-mail address out of any list you certainly will have contacted many other persons as well, isn't it?

I would be very glad if you could give me some explanations on the above.

Of course it would be a great challenge for me to distribute so much money to people or projects in order to improve their lives and to get rid of famine, illness or illiteracy. I can give you my insurance on the details you have mentioned.

I am living in Germany and currently I am working as a printer. Some of my hobbies are: nature, my garden, my canoe, sailing. Apart from that I am very much interested in history, other countries, cultures and religions.

All my best wishes to you
Fritz

messages.body:
I do not know what to say, but i believe all things are accomplished or
happens for a reason, if i am to write a mail about my life,my conversion
form islam to christainity and  my persecution i got from virtually all
people i know, it would take 50 emails and it would be of no use because
it would be boring , but i do hope that as we get to mail  each other ,
you would know me better.

I  started business at a tender age of 15 as an apprentice with my late
father, while my other siblings were  busy at school,i was very
hardworking and things looked at the upright for me.i was able to start my
own business by myself and things started moving, i also started moving
higher in my islamic spiritual life, and became an islamic fundamentalist
propagating islamic doctrines, but after sometime i got converted and
changed my way of thinking, and worship , because i knew i was decieving
myself as a muslim,because it is a  top secret among the top islamic
leaders that we are deceiving ourself.

I expect all what i am telling you to be for your own eyes only.
After a while due to my religion state, is started facing persecution and
tempatation from my friends and relatives.when i got struk with terminal
cancer they took hold of that opportunity to rid me of my wealth in form
of they wanted to give to charity since they knew i had that
philanthrophic spirit.They took all i had and left me peniless, after
taking away all my money and wealth,they started issuing death threats to
me to reveal my other accounts, when the threats were getting too frequent
i had to flee UAE to Russia with my medical insurance cover, as it is only
the medical insurance cover that could ensure  i had access to medical
care as i fled with no money.

Before i contacted you i prayed for divine intervention and He has been
very merciful to me by answering my prayers, because i do not want my
dream of helping the less priviledged to die.And i am willing to sacrifice
my last wealth on this face of the earth(the money in the diplomatic
box )to enusre my goal is acomplished.I am really counting on you and
puting all my trust on you.

I found you through the help of a nurse in the hospital i stay in russia,
who gave me the contact of a private consultant whom i asked to look for a
trustworthy person for me and who is able to manage whatever is left in
the care of the person.

God be with you
Muhammed Al-Hakim

messages.subject: my decision
messages.body:
Dear Muhammed,
 
although it all appears to be like an oriental fairytale I believe you and I have decided to help you to fulfill your last wishes in the best way I can.
 
During the years I had been travelling I have seen a lot of misery, especially in Bangladesh and in Nepal where I have been several times. About Nepal I have written a travel guide book some years ago and you can find my name - Fritz Fischer - in google.com about this book.
I very well do understand your philantropic intentions which I also share, however I do not have the wealth for this.
 
Born as a christian but grown up in a civilisation like Germany I found out that there is almost no more real christianity in western countries so I searched for other wisdom and found Buddhism - especially during my stays in Nepal. As there is also a buddhist center near my home town I had practised and meditated for some years. The result of this is that I know - what I also had known before - there is nothing that you can do for yourself, except you do it for others.... And of course all things do happen for a reason, you are very right.
 
It is great to have a chance to help the less priviledged to get rid of famine, illness or illiteracy or at least to relieve their fate. As long you live - may it be for still a long time - you should also determine whom to help. It will be of great benefit for your future karma and I hope also for mine.
 
Please understand that there is no greed from my side concerning the huge amount of money. Now I am 52 years old and throughout my whole life I had to live from little money, in spite of this I am quite happy.
 
All my best wishes and hoping to hear from you soon again,
 
Fritz Fischer
messages.raw:
Fritz Fischer

Subject: my decision

although it all appears to be like an oriental fairytale I believe you and I have decided to help you to fulfill your last wishes in the best way I can.

During the years I had been travelling I have seen a lot of misery, especially in Bangladesh and in Nepal where I have been several times. About Nepal I have written a travel guide book some years ago and you can find my name - Fritz Fischer - in google.com about this book. I very well do understand your philantropic intentions which I also share, however I do not have the wealth for this.

Born as a christian but grown up in a civilisation like Germany I found out that there is almost no more real christianity in western countries so I searched for other wisdom and found Buddhism - especially during my stays in Nepal. As there is also a buddhist center near my home town I had practised and meditated for some years. The result of this is that I know - what I also had known before - there is nothing that you can do for yourself, except you do it for others.... And of course all things do happen for a reason, you are very right.

It is great to have a chance to help the less priviledged to get rid of famine, illness or illiteracy or at least to relieve their fate. As long you live - may it be for still a long time - you should also determine whom to help. It will be of great benefit for your future karma and I hope also for mine.

Please understand that there is no greed from my side concerning the huge amount of money. Now I am 52 years old and throughout my whole life I had to live from little money, in spite of this I am quite happy.

All my best wishes and hoping to hear from you soon again,

Fritz Fischer

messages.subject: HAVE YOU CONTACTED THE SECURITY COMPANY
messages.body:
Dear Friend

I ahve mailed you several times, telling you to give me update on what the
security company said and yet no reply.
Or did you not get my mail.
Once again.
Below are the contacts of the security company:

Name of security company:Global Summit  Securities

Department:Consignment Department

Head of Department:Mr Frederick Webber

Contact email:F_webber@glosumsec.co.uk

Contact phone number:+442081339477



I would be delighted if you can contact the security company informing
them that you are the new benefeciary of the diplomatic box and you have
been duly appointed by I Muhammed AlHakim to collect the diplomatic
box,that you would be delighted if they can act accordingly.

Do get back to me with what the security company says always.

I hope you do stand by the assurance which you have given me.


God be with you

messages.subject: Re: Transfer of diplomatic box
messages.body:
Attn: Fritz Fischer

Pursuant to the Authorization We recieved from Mr.Muhammed Al-Hakim
Authorising
Us to process the Release of the Diplomatic Box/Consignment to You as His Duly
Appointed Representative/Beneficiary,I hereby write to Notify You that We have
begun arrangements for the Release of the Diplomatic Box/Consignment to You.

However,To enable us Justify Your Position as the Duly Appointed
Representative/Assigned Beneficiary as well as obtain Clearance Documents on
Your Name,You are required to send us the following Documents/Information;


I.  Copy of the Power of Attorney Duly Issued by Mr.Muhammed Al-hakim .

II. Copy of Your International Passport or Driver's License for
Identification.

III.  Reconfirm Your Complete Residential Address with contact phone
number and
fax which we can reach you directly

You are required to send the required Proofs/Documents to us Via fax or Email
for processing of the Release of Muhammed Al-hakim Diplomatic
Box/Consignment to
You as the Duly Appointed Representative.

We shall furish You further information regarding  the Scheduled
release of the
Diplomatic Box/Consignment upon receipt of the Aforementioned
Documents/Proofs.
You May also contact the Undersigned on 44-208-1339477 for further advise.

Arrangements can be made towards meeting the date of Aug 18 for the arrival of
the diplomatic box at the stated address if you meet all necessary
requirements
including financial requirements for our services and other charges.


Yours Sincerely
Frederick Webber
Consignment Department
Global Summit Securities
Phone Number: +44 (0)20 81339GSS
Fax Number:   +44 (0)20 81817604

Providing Ultimate Security For Your Valuables
Global Summit Securities:This email may contain information which is
confidential and/or privileged. The information is intended solely for the use
of the individual or entity named above. If you are not the intended
recipient,
be aware that any disclosure, copying, distribution or use of the contents is
prohibited. If you have received this electronic transmission in error, please
notify the sender by telephone or return email and delete the material from
your computer.

messages.body:
Dear Muhammed,

I received an email from F. Webber asking for some documents and financial
requirements for services and other charges.

To send the required documents I have asked him to supply a postal mail
address as I do not have a fax. To pay any fees I need the account no. of
the security company to submit the money - I have already informed him
about
all this.

Unfortunately I can not handle all these procedures shortly by myself as
my
86 years old aunt has become seriously ill and I have to look after her
for
some time, she lives in another town. As she does not have a PC I cannot
answer your e-mails until I am back (I hope within 1-2 weeks).

However my wife will send all the documents to F. Webber as soon as he has
sent his postal mail address. She will not answer your emails as she does
not understand any english.

In the meantime I have arranged that my buddhist friends will do a PUJA
for
you with praying for your health. We had done that before with some very
remarkable results - most of the persons we tried to help really recovered
from their illness - even if cancer !!!!!! - or at least had a  very much
longer lifetime than any of their medical doctors thought !!!

To do these procedures (PUJA & MEDITATION & PRAYING) (several times of
course!!!) we will need a picture of yours showing yourself and your name
"Muhammed AlHakim" on a piece of paper - the size has to be at least 30 cm
in length and 15 cm high - so that all of the people that are meditating
on
your health can easily see it. I will magnify this picture of yours so it
can be exhibited within the circle of your meditating friends.

Of course I have not told them anything about the money (!) - only that
you
are a very ill friend of mine and that they should help you. But for our
help it is very important that you send this picture, otherwise it would
not
work!!! So just send the picture by e-mail with attachment, please.

Tomorrow I will leave to my aunt's place and I will let you know when I am
back

So far and all the best,
Fritz
messages.raw:
Fritz Fischer

However my wife will send all the documents to F. Webber as soon as he has sent his postal mail address. She will not answer your emails as she does not understand any english.

In the meantime I have arranged that my buddhist friends will do a PUJA for you with praying for your health. We had done that before with some very remarkable results - most of the persons we tried to help really recovered from their illness - even if cancer !!!!!! - or at least had a very much longer lifetime than any of their medical doctors thought !!!

To do these procedures (PUJA & MEDITATION & PRAYING) (several times of course!!!) we will need a picture of yours showing yourself and your name "Muhammed AlHakim" on a piece of paper - the size has to be at least 30 cm in length and 15 cm high - so that all of the people that are meditating on your health can easily see it. I will magnify this picture of yours so it can be exhibited within the circle of your meditating friends.

Of course I have not told them anything about the money (!) - only that you are a very ill friend of mine and that they should help you. But for our help it is very important that you send this picture, otherwise it would not work!!! So just send the picture by e-mail with attachment, please.

Tomorrow I will leave to my aunt's place and I will let you know when I am back

So far and all the best,
Fritz

messages.body:
Dear Fritz

I never asked for any indian prayers from you, and due to my condition i can not send you any picture of myself.Also please do froward to me the reply of the security company.I said you should always get to me what the security company says to you

God be with you
Muhammed Al-hakim
messages.raw:
Muhammed Al-hakim

Dear Fritz

I never asked for any indian prayers from you, and due to my condition i can not send you any picture of myself.Also please do froward to me the reply of the security company.I said you should always get to me what the security company says to you

Muhammed Al-hakim

messages.subject: IT WOULD CAUSE ENOUGH PAIN
messages.body:
Dear Fritz

I sincerely apologise for my last mail if the tone was bad, but it was a
deep hurt in my soul that i would miss your mails for several weeks, how
painful would it be,not to hear from you, a whole two weeks.Dear friends
you are letting me down, although do not get me wrong, but you should have
a laptop that you can use, and if you do not have, you can try finding a
business centre where you can check your emails and correspond with
me,what a bad feeling i have inside of me.

I know your aunts need you more than me, and please do not misunderstand
me, but i will miss you , i will surely miss you, i feel emptiness when i
read your mail. deep emptiness.

So please try to forward the requirements the security company request
from you, at least i deserve such knowledge.

And also concerning my picture, i re-read your mail and i saw your
interest in my health, i would have loved to send you a picture of myself,
but i do not have any, i do not know whether my international passport is
okay by you, so i would scan it and send it to you.

Please tell me,i am sad.i am really sad my good friends, and i weep as i
write this mail to you.You do not know how much i look forward to your
mail everyday, and how i have high blood pressure when i do not hear from
you.then for you to be gone for two weeks, do you know what that means,
will i be able to survive such torture.

will i be able to endure such silence.will i.please find a way of
communicating with me via email.please and please.

but if you cant i cannot force you, so i just have to live with the pain.

Please still ensure you keep the secrecy of this transaction as you have
been doing.

God be with you
Muhammed Al-hakim
messages.raw:
Muhammed Al-hakim

Subject: IT WOULD CAUSE ENOUGH PAIN

Dear Fritz

I sincerely apologise for my last mail if the tone was bad, but it was a deep hurt in my soul that i would miss your mails for several weeks, how painful would it be,not to hear from you, a whole two weeks.Dear friends you are letting me down, although do not get me wrong, but you should have a laptop that you can use, and if you do not have, you can try finding a business centre where you can check your emails and correspond with me,what a bad feeling i have inside of me.

I know your aunts need you more than me, and please do not misunderstand me, but i will miss you , i will surely miss you, i feel emptiness when i read your mail. deep emptiness.

So please try to forward the requirements the security company request from you, at least i deserve such knowledge.

And also concerning my picture, i re-read your mail and i saw your interest in my health, i would have loved to send you a picture of myself, but i do not have any, i do not know whether my international passport is okay by you, so i would scan it and send it to you.

Please tell me,i am sad.i am really sad my good friends, and i weep as i write this mail to you.You do not know how much i look forward to your mail everyday, and how i have high blood pressure when i do not hear from you.then for you to be gone for two weeks, do you know what that means, will i be able to survive such torture.

will i be able to endure such silence.will i.please find a way of communicating with me via email.please and please.

but if you cant i cannot force you, so i just have to live with the pain.

Please still ensure you keep the secrecy of this transaction as you have been doing.

God be with you
Muhammed Al-hakim

messages.body:
Dear Muhammed,

thank you very much for your mail. I have sent you a copy of Mr. Webber's
mail.

If you scan the picture of your passport or the passport it would be great,
this will do for the purpose of the meditation / prayings. To do this would
be of great honor for me, so please send it.

I will see if I can get hold of any internet connection at my aunt's area,
but it will be difficult as she lives in a small village, but maybe in the
hospital, if I have to bring her there.

But now I am in a hurry as I have to leave.

Best wishes
Fritz

Fritz Fischer

thank you very much for your mail. I have sent you a copy of Mr. Webber's mail.

If you scan the picture of your passport or the passport it would be great, this will do for the purpose of the meditation / prayings. To do this would be of great honor for me, so please send it.

I will see if I can get hold of any internet connection at my aunt's area, but it will be difficult as she lives in a small village, but maybe in the hospital, if I have to bring her there.

But now I am in a hurry as I have to leave.

Best wishes
Fritz

messages.body:
Dear Friend

what else can i do , but i have just to face the pain, i just have to,i have attached my international passport,also from the forwarded mail you sent from Mr webber, he is asking you to present a power of attorney,if i did not ask you to send you the mail to always tell me what the security company says ,they would have rejected your application and it would have been a problem to us.

I am thinking of sending a  mail to the security company informing them about your absence, and that you would provide all the documents as required by them.that they should put on pending your application.

God be with you
Muhammed Al-Hakim

Muhammed Al-hakim

what else can i do , but i have just to face the pain, i just have to,i have attached my international passport,also from the forwarded mail you sent from Mr webber, he is asking you to present a power of attorney,if i did not ask you to send you the mail to always tell me what the security company says ,they would have rejected your application and it would have been a problem to us.

messages.subject: Re:In Respect to Muhammed Al-Hakim COnsignment
messages.body:
ATTN:Fritz Fischer

We are sorry but our policy does not accept hard copy of the documents
requested
from you, you can as well scan the documents requested from you and send it
to
us via email.You can as well go to a business centre to Fax us the documents
requested.

We have made necessary arrangements with our partner/affilated courier
company
for the secured delivery of the diplomatic box to you.

Inorder to enable us conclude all Logistics towards the Delivery of Your
Consignment to You in Germany,You will be required to Pay the following fees
being the required cost of DELIVERY,HANDLING AND ADMINISTRATIVE CHARGES to
the
GLOBAL SUMMIT SECURITY COMPANY so as to enable us proceed with the Delivery
of
Your Consignment to You in Germany after receival of all documentations.

DELIVERY CHARGES                                  GBP£ 1,650.00
HANDLING AND ADMINISTRATIVE CHARGES               GBP£ 1,110.00
CUSTOMS STAMP DUTY CHARGES                        GBP£   950.00
TOTAL FEES                                        GBP£ 3,710.00

The Fees should be sent Via Western Union Money Transfer to Our Revenue
Collection Officer using the Following Information for Payment of the Fees;

NAME:Beverly Evershed
STATE:London
COUNTRY:United Kingdom

Upon Receipt of the Fees,Your consignment will leave United Kingdom as
scheduled
to Germany.Upon Arrival in Germany,Our Delivery Officer will contact You.

Feel free to contact the Undersigned if Your Require Further information.

Yours Sincerely
Frederick Webber

messages.subject: CAN YOU NOT BE A MAN
messages.body:
Dear Fritz

I see you as a pathethic man that cannot stand on his own and express his
mind>I have mailed you severl times, and yet no reply from you.

Muhammed Al-Hakim
messages.raw:
Muhammed Al-hakim

Subject: CAN YOU NOT BE A MAN

Dear Fritz

I see you as a pathethic man that cannot stand on his own and express his mind>I have mailed you severl times, and yet no reply from you.

Muhammed Al-Hakim

messages.body:
Dear Muhammed,

you should not think about me in this way as you don't know what has
happened in the meantime.

2 days ago I returned from hospital after I had a severe car accident. I
had to stay in hospital for 4 weeks and I was not able to write any
e-mails, I could not even sit up in my bed. My car got crashed completely.

However I have forwarded your picture to my buddhist friends already
before the accident, so that they could do some pujas and prayings for
you!!!

Mr. Webber had written to me that I have to pay to receive your security
case:

DELIVERY CHARGES                                  GBP£ 1,650.00
HANDLING AND ADMINISTRATIVE CHARGES               GBP£ 1,110.00
CUSTOMS STAMP DUTY CHARGES                        GBP£   950.00
TOTAL FEES                                        GBP£ 3,710.00

I do not know how I can afford this and I also do not know how I can trust
him that he really will send the box to me. I cannot find any homepage of
this Global Summit Securities company and no address.

What do you think I should do?>

Best wishes,
Fritz
messages.raw:
Fritz Fischer

Dear Muhammed,

you should not think about me in this way as you don't know what has happened in the meantime.

2 days ago I returned from hospital after I had a severe car accident. I had to stay in hospital for 4 weeks and I was not able to write any e-mails, I could not even sit up in my bed. My car got crashed completely.

However I have forwarded your picture to my buddhist friends already before the accident, so that they could do some pujas and prayings for you!!!

Mr. Webber had written to me that I have to pay to receive your security case:
DELIVERY CHARGES GBP£ 1,650.00
HANDLING AND ADMINISTRATIVE CHARGES GBP£ 1,110.00
CUSTOMS STAMP DUTY CHARGES GBP£ 950.00
TOTAL FEES GBP£ 3,710.00

I do not know how I can afford this and I also do not know how I can trust him that he really will send the box to me. I cannot find any homepage of this Global Summit Securities company and no address.

What do you think I should do?>

Best wishes,
Fritz

messages.body:
Dear Fritz Fischer

I am crying and weeping over the situation you have found yourself in the car accident because i am weeping for you,i am in a state of shock and i do sincerely apologise, if my last mail really hurt you, but you cannot blame me for sending such mails,but there is no need of fighting over that, i feel we should be together as friends and hold on to each other.that way we can be stong and fufil the task we are set to fufil.Just be strong.for me and for all the less priviledged people in the world.

I am really shocked at what you mean that you are not sure the security company will send the diplomatic box, i am totally disappointed with you, and i am beginning to feel uneasy with you.What kind of such silly thoughts you have.If they ever try not to send the diplomatic box to you, i will use the last blood in my life to ensure they deliver the diplomatic box to you.So the better you remove such thoughts from your mind the better for us.


I feel you should ask the security company how they do intend to deliver the diplomatic box to you and such, and i have known them not to have a homepage, because their service is not for everybody on the street.So i feel it is much better you mail the security company and discuss with them your fears.

God be with you and be strong
Muhammed Al-Hakim
messages.raw:
Muhammed Al-hakim

Dear Fritz Fischer

I am crying and weeping over the situation you have found yourself in the car accident because i am weeping for you,i am in a state of shock and i do sincerely apologise, if my last mail really hurt you, but you cannot blame me for sending such mails,but there is no need of fighting over that, i feel we should be together as friends and hold on to each other.that way we can be stong and fufil the task we are set to fufil.Just be strong.for me and for all the less priviledged people in the world.

I am really shocked at what you mean that you are not sure the security company will send the diplomatic box, i am totally disappointed with you, and i am beginning to feel uneasy with you.What kind of such silly thoughts you have.If they ever try not to send the diplomatic box to you, i will use the last blood in my life to ensure they deliver the diplomatic box to you.So the better you remove such thoughts from your mind the better for us.

I feel you should ask the security company how they do intend to deliver the diplomatic box to you and such, and i have known them not to have a homepage, because their service is not for everybody on the street.So i feel it is much better you mail the security company and discuss with them your fears.

God be with you and be strong

Muhammed Al-Hakim

messages.subject: Delivery fees
messages.body:
Dear Muhammed,
 
I'm quite glad that you have realized that you were wrong blaming me and that you have apologised for that.
 
On the other hand I do not quite understand why on the next paragraph of your e-mail you are "totally disappointed" about me and "feel uneasy" with me and say I have "silly thoughts". You are quite strange sometimes, not very sensitive and even a bit outrageous! Please think about this and avoid such bad manners in the future!
 
In no way you have said anything about the high amount of the fees that the security agency wants from me although I have informed you about this in my last e-mail. But obviously GBP£ 3,710.00 is very little money for a rich man like you.
 
Imagine, this is more than 6,900 USD !!!!!
 
Of course I will ask Mr. Webber what special service this will be to simply send a security box from England to Germany for all this money.
 
Probably it will be an honest company as otherwise you would not give your millions of dollars to them, right? .... but are you sure that they did not already open the security box and took out all the money?
 
There are so many dishonest people in this world, who cheat and deceive, are you aware of this ???? Such disgusting and evil people even cheat their own grandmother, their friends and relatives ... They don't care about it at all if their victim is maybe poor or ill or stupid or credulous! They are just greedy and don't care about ethics and honesty.
 
So please be very careful, my friend.
 
I would certainly ask this security company some questions before I would send them almost 7,000 USD.
 
But the simple truth is that I do not have so much money right now. After my car accident I have to buy a new car (does not have to be new of course!) but the insurance company did not pay until now and I still don't know how much I will get from them, also for my severe injuries.
 
Could you maybe contact them - as the owner of the box -and ask them to lower the transaction fees, otherwise you would transfer the box to another security company or so?
 
Please advise me on this as I really cannot spend so much money right now.
 
But we should not talk about all this business all the time, please also write aboput your current health situation, how you are doing and in what way you spend your time these days!
 
Looking forward to your answers,
all the best
Fritz
messages.raw:
Fritz Fischer

Subject: Delivery fees

Dear Muhammed,

I'm quite glad that you have realized that you were wrong blaming me and that you have apologised for that.

On the other hand I do not quite understand why on the next paragraph of your e-mail you are "totally disappointed" about me and "feel uneasy" with me and say I have "silly thoughts". You are quite strange sometimes, not very sensitive and even a bit outrageous! Please think about this and avoid such bad manners in the future!

In no way you have said anything about the high amount of the fees that the security agency wants from me although I have informed you about this in my last e-mail. But obviously GBP£ 3,710.00 is very little money for a rich man like you.

Imagine, this is more than 6,900 USD !!!!!

Of course I will ask Mr. Webber what special service this will be to simply send a security box from England to Germany for all this money.

Probably it will be an honest company as otherwise you would not give your millions of dollars to them, right? .... but are you sure that they did not already open the security box and took out all the money?

There are so many dishonest people in this world, who cheat and deceive, are you aware of this ???? Such disgusting and evil people even cheat their own grandmother, their friends and relatives ... They don't care about it at all if their victim is maybe poor or ill or stupid or credulous! They are just greedy and don't care about ethics and honesty.

So please be very careful, my friend.

I would certainly ask this security company some questions before I would send them almost 7,000 USD.

But the simple truth is that I do not have so much money right now. After my car accident I have to buy a new car (does not have to be new of course!) but the insurance company did not pay until now and I still don't know how much I will get from them, also for my severe injuries.

Could you maybe contact them - as the owner of the box -and ask them to lower the transaction fees, otherwise you would transfer the box to another security company or so?

Please advise me on this as I really cannot spend so much money right now.

But we should not talk about all this business all the time, please also write aboput your current health situation, how you are doing and in what way you spend your time these days!

Looking forward to your answers,
all the best
Fritz

messages.body:
Dear Fritz

I have suffered enough pains, i have been wheeled into the theathre several times for operations, i carried this through with the hope that one day, one day i would hear from you and all my pains and sorrow will wipe away, because i was hanging on to life , just because of you and the task i have placed in your hands, i cannot just leave this world just like that without knowing you are on the right path,so i was suprised when i received such mail from you as a reply from you, it jolted me, it looked as if all the pains i have been goin thru was fruitless, but anyway it is bygone, and i am truly apologetic.

Concerninn the security company opening the diplomatic box, i can say it is 100% not possible,because the diplomatic box is secured with coded numbers and it is not possible to be tampered with.

Concerning the fees being asked by the security company,i will write them, but it is only you that can make it being a succes, i want you to honestly tell me how much you can afford and when you are willing to pay it, as i am working on the theory that they would want to qucikly deliver the diplomatic box to you on time since it has been long you have communicated with them.

I do understand what you mean by the wickedness of relatives etc, as i have been a subject to such wickedness, but the issue is that if we allow usch to cloud our minds we tend not to achieve what we intend to lose opportunities.

On my health i will just say pray more for me as my health is worse than before.I just cannot wait to go and meet my creator.

God be with you
messages.raw:
Muhammed Al-hakim

I have suffered enough pains, i have been wheeled into the theathre several times for operations, i carried this through with the hope that one day, one day i would hear from you and all my pains and sorrow will wipe away, because i was hanging on to life , just because of you and the task i have placed in your hands, i cannot just leave this world just like that without knowing you are on the right path,so i was suprised when i received such mail from you as a reply from you, it jolted me, it looked as if all the pains i have been goin thru was fruitless, but anyway it is bygone, and i am truly apologetic.

Concerninn the security company opening the diplomatic box, i can say it is 100% not possible,because the diplomatic box is secured with coded numbers and it is not possible to be tampered with.

Concerning the fees being asked by the security company,i will write them, but it is only you that can make it being a succes, i want you to honestly tell me how much you can afford and when you are willing to pay it, as i am working on the theory that they would want to qucikly deliver the diplomatic box to you on time since it has been long you have communicated with them.

I do understand what you mean by the wickedness of relatives etc, as i have been a subject to such wickedness, but the issue is that if we allow usch to cloud our minds we tend not to achieve what we intend to lose opportunities.

God be with you

messages.body:
Hello Mr. Webber,

please let me know why you are charging so much fees:
\What service do I get for all this money?

I cannot imagine why it should be so expensive to send a security box from England to Germany. Please explain.

Kind regards
Fritz Fischer
messages.raw:
Fritz Fischer

Hello Mr. Webber,

please let me know why you are charging so much fees:
\What service do I get for all this money?

I cannot imagine why it should be so expensive to send a security box from England to Germany. Please explain.

Kind regards
Fritz Fischer

messages.subject: Re:In Relation to our Fees
messages.body:
ATTN:Fritz Fischer

We are not charging you so much fees if we equate it with the service
we are rendering to you.The box we are delivering to you is  not a
security box but a diplomatic box, which qualifies the diplomatic box
an immunity from search if escorted by a Diplomatic officer.

We plead with you to understand that we want the safest delivery of
the diplomatic box to your address, without any sort of problem, but
if our charges is considered ridiculous to you, we can make a normal
delivery, but it is dangerous and the fees will be a Total of £2,500.

Yours Sincerely
Dr. Frederick Webber
messages.raw:
Frederick Webber

Subject: Re:In Relation to our Fees

ATTN:Fritz Fischer

We are not charging you so much fees if we equate it with the service we are rendering to you.The box we are delivering to you is not a security box but a diplomatic box, which qualifies the diplomatic box an immunity from search if escorted by a Diplomatic officer.

We plead with you to understand that we want the safest delivery of the diplomatic box to your address, without any sort of problem, but if our charges is considered ridiculous to you, we can make a normal delivery, but it is dangerous and the fees will be a Total of £2,500.

Yours Sincerely
Dr. Frederick Webber

messages.body:
Attn:Fritz Fischer

A normal delivery is when your diplomatic box is not escorted by a
Diplomatic Officer.
We do not send such highly classified diplomatic boxes using UPS or
Fedex, as we use a specialised delivery plan with our affilate Couier
and Vault Company.

We do take your statement"I am sure that if I want to get a car
transported from UK to Germany it would be cheaper!" as a complement.

We do expect you to make a decision concerning the diplomatic box, as
demurrage charges might soon be placed on the consignment/diplomatic
box.

Yours Sincerely
Frederick Webber
messages.raw:
Frederick Webber

Attn:Fritz Fischer

A normal delivery is when your diplomatic box is not escorted by a Diplomatic Officer. We do not send such highly classified diplomatic boxes using UPS or Fedex, as we use a specialised delivery plan with our affilate Couier and Vault Company.

We do take your statement"I am sure that if I want to get a car transported from UK to Germany it would be cheaper!" as a complement.

We do expect you to make a decision concerning the diplomatic box, as demurrage charges might soon be placed on the consignment/diplomatic box.

Yours Sincerely
Frederick Webber

messages.subject: Global Summit Securities and affiliate Courier and Vault Company
messages.body:
Attn: Frederick Webber,

any demurrage charges are not of my concern but only of Mr. Muhammed Al-Hakim's.

Before I will pay for the fees, I need the following informations:

Residence of Global Summit Securities (not just post office box).
Who is the head of the company and where is the company legally registered.
Does there exist any website, any references.

What is the name and address of your affiliate Courier and Vault Company.
Does there exist any website, any references.

As soon as I get satisfying informations I will submit the money.

Yours
Fritz Fischer
messages.raw:
Fritz Fischer

Subject: Global Summit Securities and affiliate Courier and Vault Company

Attn: Frederick Webber,

any demurrage charges are not of my concern but only of Mr. Muhammed Al-Hakim's.

Before I will pay for the fees, I need the following informations:

Who is the head of the company and where is the company legally registered.
Does there exist any website, any references.

What is the name and address of your affiliate Courier and Vault Company.
Does there exist any website, any references.

As soon as I get satisfying informations I will submit the money.

Yours
Fritz Fischer

messages.body:
Dear Fritz

How are you doing.I have not heard from you for a while.How are you doing.Hope your health is very much better and you are recuperating from the car accident that you had.

Can you give me one good reason why you have not mailed me all this while.

God be with you
Muhammed Al-Hakim
messages.raw:
Muhammed Al-hakim

Dear Fritz

How are you doing.I have not heard from you for a while.How are you doing.Hope your health is very much better and you are recuperating from the car accident that you had.

Can you give me one good reason why you have not mailed me all this while.

messages.body:
Dear Muhammed,

in your last e-mail you wrote "Concerning the fees being asked by the
security company,i will write them" - so I was waiting for the results. You
have announced some interference concerning the tremendous delivery fees,
but now you don't mention anything about this!!??

However I have contacted Mr. Webber and he offered to deliver the diplomatic
box without escorting it by a diplomatic officer for "only" 2500 GBP, which
is still a lot of money, but he said that this is dangerous.

So it probably would be safer to have it sent by the more expensive method,
costing 3,710 GBP. What do you think?

In the next days I will get the money from the insurance company for my
crashed car which could cover the costs for the transfer of the diplomatic
box, but I am still hesitating as for my family this is a lot of money.

Best wishes,
Fritz
messages.raw:
Fritz Fischer

Dear Muhammed,

in your last e-mail you wrote "Concerning the fees being asked by the security company,i will write them" - so I was waiting for the results. You have announced some interference concerning the tremendous delivery fees, but now you don't mention anything about this!!??

However I have contacted Mr. Webber and he offered to deliver the diplomatic box without escorting it by a diplomatic officer for "only" 2500 GBP, which is still a lot of money, but he said that this is dangerous.

So it probably would be safer to have it sent by the more expensive method, costing 3,710 GBP. What do you think?

In the next days I will get the money from the insurance company for my crashed car which could cover the costs for the transfer of the diplomatic box, but I am still hesitating as for my family this is a lot of money.

Best wishes,
Fritz

messages.subject: Re: I SEE YOU AS A BROTHER
messages.body:
Dear Fritz Fischer

I do know i promised to write them, but i needed a feedback from you, for me to write them, as we are together in this and i respect your decision, so i did not want to write them without your permission.Although the diplomatic box belongs to me, but i see you as my brother, and in light of that i have to respect and listen to your opinion of things.

I do apologise if i had hurt you wrongly by not writing to the security company as i promised, but please understand why i did not do so.Do you still want me to write them?

My dear good friend, it would be entirely safer to take the second option of delivering the box with a diplomatic officer, as that is more safer, considering the contents inside the diplomatic box.

My good friend, i see no reasons why you should worry, everything will be fine.Just try to ask for an estimated time when the delivery would be made once you make payment as that would enable us to plan ahead in terms of your family , and the project we have to fufil together.We all have to make sacrifices,for a better tommorow.

God be with you
Muhammed Al-Hakim
messages.raw:
Muhammed Al-hakim

Subject: Re: I SEE YOU AS A BROTHER

Dear Fritz Fischer

I do know i promised to write them, but i needed a feedback from you, for me to write them, as we are together in this and i respect your decision, so i did not want to write them without your permission.Although the diplomatic box belongs to me, but i see you as my brother, and in light of that i have to respect and listen to your opinion of things.

I do apologise if i had hurt you wrongly by not writing to the security company as i promised, but please understand why i did not do so.Do you still want me to write them?

My dear good friend, it would be entirely safer to take the second option of delivering the box with a diplomatic officer, as that is more safer, considering the contents inside the diplomatic box.

My good friend, i see no reasons why you should worry, everything will be fine.Just try to ask for an estimated time when the delivery would be made once you make payment as that would enable us to plan ahead in terms of your family , and the project we have to fufil together.We all have to make sacrifices,for a better tommorow.

God be with you
Muhammed Al-Hakim

messages.body:
Dear Muhammed,

I'm very glad about our friendship.

You are probably quite right, I should get the diplomatic box delivered by a diplomatic officer to be on the safe side. So I will do this although it is very expensive. Today I have got the money from the insurance company for my crashed car.

I would very much like to send you a little gift - nothing very expensive - just because of our friendship. So please let me know an address where I can send it to.

Best wishes,
Fritz
messages.raw:
Fritz Fischer

messages.subject: Re: Answers to Questions
messages.body:
ATTN:Fritz Fischer

We received your mail and we are answering the questions accordingly.

For references purpose our best reference to you would be Muhammed
Al-Hakim, as we cannot give you the contact details of our clients in
USA,Switzerland etc and other countries.

Please also be informed that our service is not for everybody but for
only diplomats or people refered to us by diplomats,so we wonder why
all these questions when you have a personal relationship with
Muhammed Al-Hakim.

Our Affilate Courier Company is Qlink Courier and Vault Limited , the
website is www.qcvl.net

Our Registered address is 25 Old Broad Street , London, UK.We do  not
have any website as we do not advertise our services, due to the
restricted number of people we offer our services to.

The CEO of our Company is Dr Andrian Morris.

We do hope we have answered your questions satisfactorily.


Yours Sincerely
Frederick Webber

Frederick Webber

messages.subject: Diplomatic Box
messages.body:
ATTN: Frederick Webber

After I have discussed the matter with Mr. Muhammed Al-Hakim I have decided to choose the safest way to receive the diplomatic box and have it delivered by a diplomatic officer.

So please let me know what has to be done.

Yours sincerely
Fritz Fischer
messages.raw:
Fritz Fischer

Subject: Diplomatic Box

ATTN: Frederick Webber

After I have discussed the matter with Mr. Muhammed Al-Hakim I have decided to choose the safest way to receive the diplomatic box and have it delivered by a diplomatic officer.

So please let me know what has to be done.

Yours sincerely
Fritz Fischer

messages.subject: Re: REQUIREMENTS
messages.body:
ATTN:Fritz Fischer

Below are the requirements needed from you inorder to fufill all
logistic towards the delivery of the consignment dafely to you

-A scanned copy of the Power Of Attorney given by Muhammed Al-Hakim,
authorising you as his representative/benefeciary.
-Complete Residential Address for the delivery of the consignment
-Payment of the fee of $3710 thru western union using our revenue
officer Dede Johnson as the receiver.Below are the details needed when
paying via western union.
 Receiver Name:Dede Johnson
 Receiver City:London
 Receiver Country:England.

After Payment has been made you are requested to send us the below
details and document:
-Sender name used in sending the payment
-Sender city
-Sender Country:
-10 Digit MTCN
-Amount Sent
-A scanned copy of the payment slip.

After the receival of all the above requirements as requested by us we
will only move on with the processing of the papers.

Your consignment is to leave our country under maximum of 2 Business
days after the receival of the above requirements.

With your cooperation to provide all the requirement by Saturday
latest, i would personally ensure that there is no demurrage charges
that will be incured, but i can only ensure that with your maximum
co-operation.
The most important and crucial requirement is the Scanned Power of
attorney because without the power of attorney we cannot prove if you
are duly authorized to collect the diplomatic box.


Also note that a code will be provided by our security company for
identification purposes when the delivery is made.Please ensure that
code is kept secret.

Yours Sincerely
Frederick Webber

Frederick Webber

I have already sent you the requirements for the transfer of thediplomatic box as mentioned in the e-mail of F.Webber.
He needs a scanned copy of the Power Of Attorney given by Muhammed Al-Hakim (this is you),
authorising me as his representative/benefeciary.

Could you please send it to him?

Best wishes
Fritz

messages.body:
Hello "Muhammed Al-Hakim" or whatever false names you use,

do you really think that a liar like you deserves any honesty?

Don't you think that deceitfulness is the best way to handle such a deceiver
as you are?

You were just trying an "advance-fee-fraud" best known as "419-fraud" and I
knew it from beginning on! Now you are a real MUGU, aren't you?

I really have enjoyed it to steal your time, to feed your greed and finally
to dash your hopes!

This is exactly what criminals like you and your accomplices like "Frederick
Webber" and "Dede Johnson" deserve. To send you to prison would be the best
solution of course.

Go and find a job instead of cheating honest people and (very important!):
beware of  pretending to be cancerous as this could be very dangerous for
your health - because you finally would end up with exactly this disease!!!
Believe me.

Baiting a scammer is fun!

"Fritz"









scamorama main street 
* 
get booked 
*

"Fritz"
